name: compactbeans
short_description:
This is a separated-out implementation of the java.beans.Introspector and
associated Descriptor classes, targeted at Java 1.8SE Compact Profile 1.

The code is based on the openjdk source bundles. The aim is for API compatibility as much as possible. In the simplest case, a package import rename is all that is required.

The source code can be found on GitHub at https://github.com/run2000/compactbeans

The javadocs can be found at http://compactbeans.sourceforge.net/docs/1.1RC/api/

The license is the same as for OpenJDK itself. That is, GPL version 2 only, with the "Classpath" exception as described in the LICENSE file.
summary: Implementation of java.beans.* for JavaSE compact profile 1

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: OS Independent (Written in an interpreted language)
os.fullname: OS Independent (Written in an interpreted language)
